Matt Boyd- Good depth piece, will be a good addition to the bullpen when he returns. 3.89 ERA in 78.2 IP for Detroit in 2021.

In 53 games for Tacoma in '22, Kelenic has slashed .289/.355/.551 with 11 home runs, 37 RBI, 34 XBH, 3 SB with 59 Ks to 20 walks. 

RE the Ks, 23.8% of PAs have been Ks, but 25 of 59 Ks came in his first 14 AAA games. Since then, 34 in 39 games and strikeouts in 18.7% of 182 PAs.
